resources.string: Below are offered shift swaps,\ntap for aye or bin for naw.
Below are your shift swap requests.
Below are your pending shift requests, tap to accept or reject.
Tap on a date to see your shifts on that day and select a shift that you wish to swap
Tap below to select a shift to swap your shift on %1$s with.
Tap below to select assign a shifter to work on %1$s.
You can request a swap request by tapping on it below
Tap on a date to see shifts assigned to your team. You can assign shifts by selecting a date and using the + button.\n Press on bin to remove the shift.
No shifts on the selected day
